message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its incredible potential value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $850,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $900,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit below your price. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
